div.p: publisher: HL7 Switzerland on behalf of ZAS

description: Providers of benefits covered by the invalidity insurance receive their own identification number (NIF). See [ZAS](https://www.zas.admin.ch/zas/de/home/partenaires-et-institutions-/paiement-des-prestations-individuelles-avs-ai/information-a-l-attention-des-fournisseurs-de-prestations.html)
